## base.CascadingContextMatcher.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `CascadingContextMatcher` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(child: AnyMatcherOrData, contextModifiers: Record<string, string>, currentRunModifiers: Record<string, string>);
```

## Parameters

| Parameter           | Type                                                                | Description                                           |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| child               | [AnyMatcherOrData](./test-equivalence-matchers.anymatcherordata.md) | The matcher to apply these context changes to         |
| contextModifiers    | Record&lt;string, string&gt;                                        | a map of properties to add to the context object      |
| currentRunModifiers | Record&lt;string, string&gt;                                        | a map of properties to add to the current run object. |
